description: Explore an ancient temple filled with traps, puzzles, and treasures.
helpMessage:
Available commands:
- go [direction]: Move in a direction (north, south, east, west)
- take [item]: Pick up an item
- use [item]: Use an item in your inventory
- look: Examine your surroundings
- inventory: Check what you're carrying
- help: Show this help message
invalidCommandMessage: I don't understand that command. Try 'help' for available commands.
invalidDirectionMessage: Which direction do you want to go?
invalidItemMessage: What do you want to take?
cantUseMessage: You can't use that item here.
saveErrorMessage: Failed to save game. Please make sure your browser supports local storage.
loadCorruptedMessage: Failed to load game. Save data might be corrupted.
gameOverMessage: Game is over. Refresh the page to start a new game.
